mapper.select: SELECT wor_book.BookId, wor_book.BookName, wor_book.`Partition`, wor_book.BookIntroduction, wor_book.BookUpdated, wor_book.BookCoverImage, wor_book.BookWordCount, wor_book.BookStatus, wor_book.BookHit, wor_book.BookCollect, wor_book.BookCopperCoins, wor_book.BookSilverCoins FROM wor_book WHERE wor_book.UserId = #{wor_book.UserId} ORDER BY wor_book.BookUpdated DESC
